articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Party Leaders
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), separately met and had talks with Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, and Vojtech Filip, chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia. Ri is heading a delegation of the WPK to the 18th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties held in Vietnam.
					 At the talks Ri Su Yong said the WPK and the Korean people under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un are making all efforts to carry out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK, while smashing the hostile forces' moves for aggression, sanctions and schemes to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed the will to boost the friendly relations with foreign parties which fully support the cause of the WPK.
					
					 Nguyen Phu Trong said that the friendly relations between the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries forged by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung have steadily grown strong. He expressed the consistent stand of the Communist Party of Vietnam to support peace, security and reunification of the Korean peninsula and steadily boost the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					 Gyula Thurmer said the WPK is the powerful party which is defending and advancing socialism, stressing the will to extend full solidarity to the WPK in its struggle for building a powerful socialist country in the future, too.
					
					 He hoped that the WPK and the Korean people would achieve big successes in the work for accomplishing the just cause by displaying the heroic spirit and will and under the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Vojtech Filip said his party is learning a lot from the experience of the WPK which enjoys a high prestige in the international community, expressing the will to develop the friendly relations between the two parties in all fields. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Su Yong separately met the chairman of the Committee for External Affairs of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the former prime minister of Nepal who is high leader of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) and member of its Presidium, the chairman of the C.C, the Communist Party of Sri Lanka, the general secretary of the People's Progressive Party of Guyana, the vice-chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is first vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the State Duma, the general secretary of the C.C., the Workersâ€™of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the Communist Party of Britain and the general secretary of the Palestinian Communist Party.

articles.title: Head of WPK Delegation Stresses Need to Struggle for Victory of Cause of Human Independence and Socialism
articles.content:
Head of WPK Delegation Stresses Need to Struggle for Victory of Cause of Human Independence and Socialism
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and head of its delegation, made a speech at the 18th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties which was opened in Hanoi on Oct. 28.
					 The WPK will wage a positive struggle to defend peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the world and achieve the victory of the cause of  human independence and socialism amid the support and encouragement of the communist parties and workers' parties in the world in the future, too, he said, adding:
					
					 The international meetings of the above-said parties held over the past several decades have made great contributions to exchanging successes and experience gained in the struggle to frustrate the imperialists' moves against socialism and steadily advance the socialist movement in conformity with its noble mission and purpose and to strengthening mutual support and solidarity.
					
					 Serious confrontation and struggle are now under way between the world progressives struggling to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the countries and the nations and the imperialist reactionary forces engrossed in aggression and war, high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena.
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialists are seeking to violate and obliterate the sovereignty of the countries and the nations and realize their hegemonic ambition under the pretext of "democracy", "war on terrorism," defence of human rights" and "globalization".
					
					 It is the most important and urgent task for the communist parties and workers' parties to check and frustrate aggression, interference in internal affairs and war by the imperialist and hegemonic forces and preserve global peace and security and thus achieve genuine international justice.
					
					 It is the final goal of the WPK to accomplish the socialist cause and completely realize the independence of the popular masses.
					
					 The WPK is now ushering in a great heyday in the efforts to accomplish the cause of building a powerful socialist country under the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the top post.
					
					 It is the goal of the struggle of our party to build a peaceful world free from a war and it is the consistent stand of our party to struggle for regional and global peace and security.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Political Party Figures
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Political Party Figures
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), separately met and had talks with the general secretary of the Communist Party of Canada, the secretary in charge of international affairs of the Communist Party of Turkey, the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Belarus, the secretary in charge of international relations of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of South Africa, the general secretary of the Communist Party of Jordan, the director of the External Relations Department of the Communist Party of Iraq, the general secretary of the Communist Party of Israel, the international secretary of the Communist Party of Norway and a member of the International Secretariat of the Communist Party of the People of Spain. Ri is heading a delegation of the WPK to the 18th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties he
					 ld in Vietnam.
					
					 At the talks Ri expressed thanks to foreign political parties for extending full support and encouragement to the just struggle of the WPK and the Korean people vigorously advancing while frustrating the U.S. imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and stressed the need to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 Foreign political party figures expressed their admiration at the WPK and the Korean people making shining successes startling the world in the struggle for defending socialism and building a powerful country while overcoming all hardships and difficulties of the history.
					
					 They expressed the will to extend firm support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people in the future, too, and the steadfast stand to invariably develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Dinh Nhu Hoan arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Buddhist Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Buddhist Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation with Raitei Arima, director general of the Kyoto Buddhist Society of Japan, as its honorary leader and Imei Miyamoto, representation officer of Head Temple, Shohin-ji, as its leader, Monday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born, the members of the delegation looked round historical relics preserved, being briefed on the story of the home.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Sci-Tech Complex and the Mausoleum of King Tongmyong.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mushroom Farm Completed
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mushroom Farm Completed
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- There sprang up a modern mushroom producer here.
					 The farm has an integral production system and a perfect sci-tech dissemination system. It is a structure in the era of the Workers' Party and another precious establishment greatly conducive to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The appearance of the farm with a high production capacity as a standard unit for the industrialization of the mushroom cultivation helped lay a foundation for supplying greater quantity of tasty and nutritious mushroom to the people.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony of the farm took place on Monday.
					
					 The ceremony was attended by Pak Pong Ju, Kwak Pom Gi and Ro Tu Chol and officials concerned.
					
					 An inaugural speech was made by Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 He said that the farm is the fruition of the outlook on the people and leadership of the WPK which regards it as the supreme principle in its activities to improve the standard of the people's living.
					
					 He called for working harder to turn the country into a socialist paradise where the dreams and ideals of the people come true under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants were briefed on the farm and looked round its various places.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kumsong School, Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kumsong School, Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 Marked
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kumsong School and Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 marked their 50th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung made it sure that a school was set up to provide art performance of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Nov. 1, Juche 55 (1966) and named the school.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il energetically led the work of building Kumsong School and Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 into the reliable center of training artistic talents of the country and the center of training computer talents.
					
					 Kumsong School and Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 have grown stronger as the comprehensive center of training talents equipped with regular educational system and produced talented artistes and competent scientific and technical talents under the care of the great leaders and Marshal Kim Jong Un during the past five decades.
					
					 A meeting was held at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, officials in the field of extracurricular education for school youth and children, teachers and students of Kumsong School and Kumsong Secondary School No. 1, and teachers of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Educational and Scientific Achievements on Show
articles.content:
Educational and Scientific Achievements on Show
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- There took place an exhibition of educational and scientific achievements at the science hall of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday to mark the 50th anniversaries of Kumsong School and the Kumsong Secondary School No. 1.
					 On show were achievements made by teachers and students of those schools in educational and artistic and scientific research activities.
					
					 There were presentation of the successes made in the work to put the education on an IT and scientific basis on a high level and exchange of experience gained in the course.
					
					 Many teaching aids including dozens of experimental apparatuses, mobile models and multimedia programs were appreciated by the participants as they were helpful to increasing the creative appliance ability of students.

articles.title: 13th People's Games Close
articles.content:
13th People's Games Close
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The 13th People's Games was closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Monday.
					 The national records were renewed in four events including weightlifting and shooting and Pyongyang City place first at total standings.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team came first in the football (women), basketball (men) and volleyball  (women) matches, the Kigwancha Sport Team in the football (men) match and the Sobaeksu Sports Team in the basketball (women) match.
					
					 In the amateur group the Pyongyang players placed first in the basketball (men and women) match and volleyball (men) match and those of North Phyongan Province in the football match and those of South Phyongan Province in the volleyball (women) match.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, those in the field of physical culture and sports, sportspersons and other working people.
					
					 At the closing ceremony, rotating silk banners were conferred upon the April 25 Sports Team and  the Pyongyang City organization which came first in team standing and trophies and medals went to the organizations and players that proved successful in various events.

articles.title: Enzyme for Detecting Potato Virus Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Enzyme for Detecting Potato Virus Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Agrobiology Research Institute under the Academy of Agriculture Science in the DPRK developed a new kind of enzyme for detecting potato virus.
					 This enzyme helps promptly detect viruses exerting a harmful influence on potato growth.
					
					 It has been introduced to various units of the country, enjoying popularity for its low cost and high detecting efficiency.

articles.title: Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The housing construction is nearing completion in Obong district of Hoeryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Servicepersons finished the roof covering and painting for 990 flats and public buildings in the district.
					
					They completed the interior and exterior plastering of public buildings, including a school with a total floor space of 4,500 square meters, ahead of schedule.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Faith and Optimism of KPA and People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Faith and Optimism of KPA and People
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article that the army and people of the DPRK are strong in revolutionary optimism and faith as they are weathering great difficulties in the way of the revolution with confidence and optimism.
					 The article says that their revolutionary optimism is based on the absolute trust and ardent loyalty to the leader of the revolution and rooted in the firm belief in the victory of the socialist cause and originated from the revolutionary viewpoint on life that one should live not merely for today but for tomorrow.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 We are sure to triumph as long as we are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un. This is the core of the revolutionary optimism possessed by all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They are cheerfully marching through marshes, remaining true to the revolutionary principles despite the worst trials as they are attracted by the noble intention and warm affection of Kim Jong Un and filled with the firm determination to protect him at the cost of their lives.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is science and victory and ideal of humankind. This is the unshakable faith of all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Fully confident that Korean-style socialism is sure to triumph, the army and people of the DPRK are fully demonstrating the might and vitality of socialism full of pride and hope while meeting all challenges of the enemies and frustrating their offensive. 
					
					 The Korean people are remaining true to their revolutionary creed even in the face of stern trials and making steady advances to win greater victory, not being carried away by the successes already achieved.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will more dynamically advance, united close around the Workers' Party of Korea, and certainly build a powerful socialist country on this land, the article concludes.

articles.title: True Nature of Park Geun Hye Regime Disclosed through Hideous Political Scandal
articles.content:
True Nature of Park Geun Hye Regime Disclosed through Hideous Political Scandal
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- "Case of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil scandal", hideous power-backed corruption case unprecedented in south Korean history, has been revealed, shocking society as a whole and causing a great furor.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentator's article observes:
					
					 The hideous political scandal called "Choe Sun Sil nuclear bomb" was by no means accidental but it was inevitability of history.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the case is a clear proof of the true nature of the Park Geun Hye regime, the most deformed, abnormal and stupid in contemporary society.
					
					 Nothing has been decided by Chongwadae from its independent stand ranging from the appointment of officials to major policies but everything has been carried out according to decisions made at "secret office" of Choe Sun Sil in Ronhyon-dong. This is the truth of Park Geun Hye politics.
					
					 Choe let her confidants hold leading posts of Chongwadae and even appointed secretaries and administrators of Chongwadae at her will, to say nothing of ministers and deputy ministers of the "government", lording it over as the de factor ruler.
					
					 Choe also has run a secret group called "Eight Fairies" involving women close to her such as those active in political and financial circles and wives of influential figures. The real power exercised by this private organization, previously unknown to the world, has far exceeded that of Chongwadae. It can be said for sure that Choe's "secret office in Ronhyon-dong" must have been the "command tower" of Chongwadae.
					
					 Self-professed experts gathered in the office every day and held a meeting reminiscent of the consultative meeting of "president" and unhesitatingly discussed and decided top secrets including diplomacy and security to say nothing of speeches to be made by Park in her official appearances and schedule of events of all kinds.
					
					 The tragic situation in south Korea is the inevitability of history and unavoidable fate of the regime of Park Geun Hye, a colonial stooge.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime to Share Military Information with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime to Share Military Information with Japan
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime decided to resume the discussion on the conclusion of pact on exchange of military information with Japan.
					 An official concerned of the regime on Oct. 27 claimed the sharing of information with the U.S. and Japan brooks no delay to cope with the substantial nuclear and missile threat from someone, adding the regime would start the discussion on what kind of negotiations it would hold with Japan.
					
					 It is not a secret that this move requested by Japan is aimed to knock into shape the triangular military alliance by activating the exchange of information with the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: S. Koreans to Stage Actions for Probing Truth behind Killing of Peasant
articles.content:
S. Koreans to Stage Actions for Probing Truth behind Killing of Peasant
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean police caved into the strong protests of south Koreans of various circles and retracted its autopsy on peasant Paek Nam Gi.
					 The Seoul Jongro Police Station announced the retraction of autopsy on Paek and handed his body to the bereaved family on Oct. 28.
					
					 The Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi declared this is a victory won by the people in their actions against the puppet authorities' unreasonable moves.
					
					 Asserting the police is wholly to blame for the killing of Paek and the prosecution shunning its investigation into the case has lost its qualifications, the organization urged the "National Assembly" to opt for a special investigation to probe the truth behind it.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Opposes Puppet Group's Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Opposes Puppet Group's Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on Oct. 27 issued a commentary denouncing the puppet group for going busy with the moves to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					 The conclusion of an agreement to protect military information with Japan is little short of officially clarifying south Korea's support for Japan's rearmament and its moves to turn itself into a military giant, it noted, adding:
					
					 The conclusion of an agreement calling for south Korea's total involvement in the missile defense system of the U.S. and Japan is a serious issue as it will gravely disturb the peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Putting Operation of Kaesong Industrial Zone on Normal Footing
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Putting Operation of Kaesong Industrial Zone on Normal Footing
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee made up of representatives of the businesses involved in the Kaesong Industrial Zone held a press conference at the puppet National Assembly on Oct. 28 at which it demanded the puppet authorities take necessary measures for putting the operation of the zone on normal footing, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 Speakers at the press conference said the businesspersons in the zone, the victims of its shutdown, could not repress their anger and protest upon hearing the news that Choe Sun Sil and other heavyweights were behind the decision to totally shut down the zone all of a sudden. 
					
					 They strongly called for starting preparations for reopening the zone.

articles.title: Campaign for Issuing Declaration on Situation Rapidly Gains in Scope and Strength in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaign for Issuing Declaration on Situation Rapidly Gains in Scope and Strength in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBN said in an article that the moves for issuing a declaration on the situation are rapidly gaining in scope and strength in south Korea in protest against "Choe Sun Sil Gate."
					 Not only students but also professors and legal circles and others are waging the campaign, demanding Park Geun Hye take a responsible attitude, the radio said.
					
					 The Seoul Local Bar Association in a statement demanded a thorough probe into the truth behind the monopolization of state affairs by Choe Sun Sil and others, it added.

articles.title: Overall Investigation into Moves for Introducing "State-compiled History Textbooks" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Overall Investigation into Moves for Introducing "State-compiled History Textbooks" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the opposition Kukmin Party of south Korea held a press conference on Oct. 28 at which he demanded an overall investigation into the moves of the puppet group for introducing the "state-compiled history textbooks", according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 If the Park Geun Hye regime is to blame for the administration monopolization by Choe Sun Sil, it should stop the moves for introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" aimed at privatizing even history and make an overall investigation into them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed in Cotonou on October 26. 
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Int'l Figure Praises WPK
articles.content:
Int'l Figure Praises WPK
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Victory and glory are always in store for the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) which has made epochal changes by leading the Korean people despite all the tempests and ordeals of history for over seven decades since its foundation.
					 Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, said this in an article titled "WPK, internationalist Korea" posted on its homepage on October 4.
					
					 The article said multifarious events take place every year in many countries to celebrate the founding anniversary of the WPK and this is related to the noble political mission, patriotic nature and international position of the WPK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Now the high international position and might of the WPK originated from the leadership of the respected HE Kim Jong Un and the strongest weapon of the single-minded unity of the service personnel and people of the DPRK united close around him.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un regards it as his iron-rule to strengthen the Party and the army and achieve development and prosperity of the country and the nation by dint of ideology.
					
					 He puts forward strengthening unity and cohesion of the whole Party as an important demand for the Party building.
					
					 The WPK is a genuine mother Party devotedly serving the people.
					
					 Giving priority to the people and respecting and loving them run through all the activities of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people call the WPK the mother Party as it is realizing the leader's love for the people under the slogan "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" and they fully turn out in the drive for implementing the Party's line and policies.

articles.title: Brazilian Body Condemns U.S. for Spreading "Story of Threat from North Korea"
articles.content:
Brazilian Body Condemns U.S. for Spreading "Story of Threat from North Korea"
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article titled "Criticizing 'story of threat from north Korea'" on October 6.
					 Noting that the American politicians persistently vociferate about "story of threat from north Korea", the article went on:
					
					 It is foolish sophism that a super power is "threatened" by a small country.
					
					 The U.S. is the biggest possessor of nukes and a country that boasts of holding military edge in the world.
					
					 As for "threat", it is the word which the DPRK should say to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. has posed extreme threat to the DPRK with nukes for more than half a century.
					
					 The leadership of north Korea put forward the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force to cope with the U.S. moves for a nuclear war and it decided the final showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The army of the DPRK is the army strong in idea and faith which no army can match. It is just the Korean People's Army in which all the service personnel and the supreme commander have united in single mind with the same intention and they fully carry out the supreme commander's order.
					
					 North Korea is a country fully prepared for attack and defence though the U.S. vociferates about military and technical supremacy.
					
					 Then has the U.S. any good method to cope with the "nuclear threat" from north Korea which may destroy the U.S.?
					
					 No matter how many interceptor missiles and THAAD the U.S. may produce and deploy in south Korea, it is useless.
					
					 The only way for the U.S. is not to provoke north Korea. That is to say, the U.S. should drop hostile policy toward north Korea, withdraw its troops from south Korea and not interfere in the internal affairs of the Korean nation.

articles.title: PTC luchara por el triunfo de la causa de independencia, enfatiza Ri Su Yong
articles.content:
PTC luchara por el triunfo de la causa de independencia, enfatiza Ri Su Yong
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el futuro tambien, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea luchara con dinamismo por la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo y por el triunfo de la causa de independencia de la humanidad, la del socialismo, contando con el apoyo y solidaridad de los partidos comunistas y del trabajo de varios paises del mundo. 
					Declaro asi Ri Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la delegacion de esta organizacion a la XVIII reunion internacional de los partidos comunistas y del trabajo, en su discurso pronunciado en esta cita iniciada el dia 28 en Hanoi, Vietnam. 
					
					Esta reunion internacional, que se celebra siglo tras siglo y decada tras decada, hizo gran contribucion a intercambiar los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en la lucha por llevar adelante el movimiento socialista frustrando las maniobras antisocialistas de los imperialistas, de acuerdo con su noble mision y meta, y fortalecer el apoyo mutuo y la solidaridad, dijo Ri y continuo:
					
					Hoy dia, en la arena internacional se agravan el antagonismo y la lucha entre los pueblos progresistas, que se esfuerzan por defender la soberania y dignidad del pais y la nacion, y las fuerzas reaccionarias imperialistas que se dedican a la agresion, guerra, despotismo y arbitrariedades. 
					
					Los imperialistas encabezados por EE.UU. tratan de violar y suprimir la soberania de otros paises y naciones y lograr su ambicion dominacionista bajo el cartel de la "democracia", "guerra antiterrorista", "defensa de DDHH" y "globalizacion". 
					
					Lograr la verdadera justicia internacional mediante la lucha por defender la paz y seguridad del mundo frustrando la agresion, la intervencion en asuntos internos y las maniobras de guerra de las fuerzas imperialistas y dominacionistas se presenta como la mayor prioridad para los partidos comunistas y del trabajo. 
					
					El PTC tiene la meta final de llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista y verificar totalmente la independencia de las masas populares. 
					
					Ahora el PTC va abriendo bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo la era de esplendor en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de una potencia socialista teniendo en su cargo cimero al companero Kim Jong Un. 
					
					La construccion de un mundo pacifico libre de guerra es la meta de lucha del PTC que mantiene firme su posicion de bregar para la paz y seguridad de la region y el mundo entero.

articles.title: Inaugurado Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong
articles.content:
Inaugurado Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong como nueva creacion de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo que demuestra el verdadero aspecto de la Corea del Juche.
					Gracias a la construccion del hospital en la capitalina zona de Munsu donde estan concentrados los centros sanitarios tales como el Instituto de Tumor Mamario adscrito a la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang, el Hospital Odontologico Ryugyong  y el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu, esa zona se hizo la villa de hospitales, que demuestra el amor al pueblo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y los habitantes pueden beneficiarse mejor del regimen de salud publica socialista.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar la vispera con la participacion de Choe Thae Bok, Kim Su Gil y el ministro de Salud Publica Kang Ha Guk, los funcionarios interesados y los de salud publica, los empleados y constructores del hospital y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El dijo que la construccion del hospital deviene un hecho jubiloso que demuestra la superioridad y vitalidad del regimen de salud publica socialista y da mucha alegria al ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					Ademas, se hizo posible ensenar a todo el mundo cuan nobles son el ideal y la meta de lucha del PTC que se empena en construir una potencia civilizada socialista, apunto.
					
					Exhorto a todos a luchar vigorosamente, unidos mas firmemente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, por construir una potencia socialista y paraiso del pueblo donde se hagan realidad el sueno y el ideal del pueblo.
					
					Los participantes realizaron un recorrido por el hospital luego de escuchar explicaciones.

articles.title: Inaugurada Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurada Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- Fue construida en esta capital la moderna base de produccion de hongos.
					 En la Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang se establecieron perfectamente el sistema de produccion integral y el de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas. 
					
					La planta es la creacion arquitectonica de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo y ademas constituye el patrimonio que contribuira mucho a la mejora de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 Deviene ademas la entidad modelo de la industrializacion de cultivo de setas que puede suministrar mucho mas hongos sabrosos y nutritivos al pueblo.
					
					 Tuvo lugar el dia 31 la ceremonia inaugural con la participacion de Pak Pong Ju, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol y los funcionarios interesados y otros.
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del premier Pak Pong Ju.
					
					  Pak dijo que la fabrica es un producto de la concepcion sobre el pueblo y la direccion del PTC que considera el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo como maximo principio de sus actividades.
					
					  Exhorto a todos a luchar bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Jong Un por convertir el pais en el paraiso socialista donde se hagan realidad el sueno y el ideal del pueblo.
					
					  Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron varios puntos de la fabrica luego de escuchar explicaciones sobre ella.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta gran escandalo politico ocurrido en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta gran escandalo politico ocurrido en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ahora produce gran revuelo en la sociedad surcoreana el inaudito "escandalo de corrupcion de Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil" acompanado del abuso del poder.
					 Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion fechada 31 el articulo de su comentarista que sigue:
					
					 Ese escandalo politico de gran tamano, llamado como "bomba atomica de Choe Sun Sil", no es un incidente casual sino hecho inevitable de la historia y suceso que debio ocurrir.
					
					  El caso, que dejo consternado a todo el mundo, deviene una prueba clara sobre la naturaleza del "poder" de Park Geun-hye mas deformado, mas anormal y mas ignorante que no se puede buscar en la sociedad contemporanea.
					
					  Hasta ahora, Chongwadae no pudo decidir por si solo ni un problema y todas las cuestiones desde el nombramiento de funcionarios publicos hasta las politicas principales se han resuelto acorde a las conclusiones de la "oficina secreta" de Choe Sun Sil situada en el barrio de Ronhyon. Esto es el aspecto verdadero de la politica de Park Geun-hye.
					
					  Choe coloco a sus subordinados files en los puestos medulares de Chongwadae y se porto como la maxima autoridad controlando a sus caprichos hasta el nombramiento de los ministros y viceministros del "gobierno" y de los secretarios y funcionarios administrativos de Chongwadae.
					
					  Para colmo, ella viene operando la sociedad clandestina "Phalsonnyo" formada por las mujeres eminentes del circulo politico, el financiero y otros y las esposas o "amigas intimas" de las personas muy importantes.
					
					  Se dice que esta organizacion privada era mas influyente que Chongwadae. Pues, la "oficina secreta" de Choe Sun Sil en el barrio de Ronhyon fue de veras la "torre de control" de Chongwadae.
					
					  En esa "oficina secreta" se reunian casi todos los dias los especialistas de distintos sectores para discutir y aprobar como si fuera el consejo consultivo de "presidenta" los discursos oficiales de Park Geun-hye, el programa de sus actividades y hasta los secretos importantes incluyendo las politicas diplomatica y de seguridad.
					
					  Este incidente tragico es destino fatal del "poder" de Park Geun-hye, lacaya colonial.
